title: Revisiting oxidation and reduction reactions for synthesizing a three-dimensional hydrogel of reduced graphene oxide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30844-30858
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05385K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hon Nhien Le, Thi Bang Tam Dao, Trung Do Nguyen, Duc Anh Dinh, Chi Nhan Ha Thuc, Van Hieu Le
A cascade-design self-heating oxidation reaction provides outstanding energy and chemical efficiencies for graphene oxide production. A reduction reaction using highly alkaline ammonia leads to a bioinspired hydrogel of reduced graphene oxide.
